_description: A charm against thieves — ten couplets

BLSl2457.First Lines:
Wo so wol this oureson saieBe nyȝth other be daieȝif
                    any man be so vnseleThat wold thi good stele…
BLSl2457.Last Lines:
…And this is the ouresonSaie him with good
                    deuocion
BLSl2457.Editions:
Bühler,  Kurt. 
             “Middle English Verses Against Thieves.” 
             Speculum
         33 (1958): 371-2: 371.
